price: 177. Toen Shoe’aib tegen hen zei: “Zullen jullie Allah dan niet vrezen?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum shuʿaybun alā tattaqūna
